text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Assoc Athletics Director Ticket Sales & Operations College Sports Posted/Updated: 10-20-2015 Brief Job Description: Oversee and manage the day-to-day ticket operations within the Athletic Ticket Office and ensure appropriate and effective transparency and communication of operations in all ticket office...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
